title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1158.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1158.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The authority shall accept requests for records and produce
records during regular business hours, which are 8:00 a.m. to 4:00
p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1158.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
